results.name: 8 lb. Sledge Hammer with 34-inch fibreglass Handle
results.description: Ideal for larger construction projects that require chipping or cracking of concrete and stone. Handle offers molded overstrike design to help protect handles for damage due to misses. Double injected handle for increased strength, durability and control and overstrike protection.

results.name: 4 lb. 14-inch Club Hammer
results.description: Patented IsoCoreÂ® Shock Relief System features an insulating collar that interrupts the path of vibration from the strike, significantly reducing the shock and punishment your body takes. Wedged demolition head concentrates force for maximum destruction and directs debris to the sides, not back at you

results.name: 16 lb. Sledge Hammer with 34-inch fibreglass Handle
results.description: Perfect for demolition projects and breaking of concrete and rocks. fibreglass double injected handle with overstrike protection, for good control and easy gripping.

results.name: 6 lb. Sledge Hammer
results.description: Clear away pieces of wood, drive in iron spikes, rock chisels, drills, large nails and other materials made of wood, cement, metal and iron with the help of the Garant fibreglass sledge hammer. This striking tool with a black finish, has a 6 lb, double-face, forged and tempered steel head for increased strength and rigidity. It has a highly visible 36 inch (91.4 cm) orange fibreglass handle with a thermoplastic rubber (TPR) anti-slip grip for maximum safety.

results.name: 4 lb. Engineer Hammer with Fibreglass Handle
results.description: Perfect for driving stakes and chipping or cracking concrete and stone. For smaller construction projects. Double injected fibreglass handle with overstrike protection, for good strength, durability and good control.

results.name: 4Lb Engineers Hammer w/Fiberglass Handle
results.description: 64 oz Sure Strike Engineers hammer with fibreglass handle

results.name: 10 lb. Sledge Hammer with 34-inch fibreglass Handle
results.description: Perfect for demolition projects and breaking of concrete and rocks. fibreglass double injected handle with overstrike protection, for good control and easy gripping.

results.name: Sledge Hammer 8 lbs
results.description: Clear away pieces of wood, drive in iron spikes, rock chisels, drills, large nails and other materials made of wood, cement, metal and iron with the help of the Garant sledge hammer. This striking tool with a black finish, has a 8 lb double face, forged and tempered steel head for increased strength and rigidity. Its 32 inch (81.3 cm) varnished hickory handle absorbs shock well. This sledge hammer is designed for DIYers and professionals looking for an efficient tool with an excellent quality/price ratio.

results.name: 12oz Smooth Face Hammer
results.description: The DEWALT 12oz MIG Weld Framing Hammer is the lightest all steel framing hammer ever made.  At just 12oz it strikes with the force of a 28oz hammer.  The lightweight design and vibration absorbing grip minimize fatigue, and the magnetic nail starter enables easy one-handed nail placement.

results.name: 22 Oz. Steel Checkered Face Hammer
results.description: The DEWALT 22 oz. one-piece Steel Hammer has optimal weight distribution for a controlled swing. Its checkered oval shaped strike face makes toe-nailing easy and helps to reduce the chance of nails to slip when struck.  This hammer also features a side nail puller for efficient and easy pulling.  It's nail starter system allows for single handed nail placement.  Its intuitive design made of a single piece of steel makes this hammer every durable.

results.name: 3-Pound Graphite Core Club Hammer with Ergonomic Handle
results.description: Whether you're working at home or on a construction site, this 3-pound (1.4 kilogram) club hammer is a great choice for any renovation or repair project. With a graphite core handle for strength, this professional grade hammer is robust, but lighter than an all-steel hammer. The head is forged in tempered carbon-steel for superior resistance to wear and a longer life. This sledgehammer also features a comfortable ergonomic handle that is flared to prevent slipping.

results.name: 16 Oz. One-Piece Steel Hammer
results.description: The DEWALT 16 oz. one-piece Steel Hammer has optimal weight distribution for a controlled swing. Its oval shaped strike face makes toe-nailing easy.  This hammer also features a side nail puller for efficient and easy pulling.  Its intuitive design made of a single piece of steel makes this hammer every durable.

results.name: 4-Pound Graphite Core Club Hammer with Ergonomic Handle
results.description: The relatively lighter weight and shorter handle of this 4-pound club hammer makes it perfect for one-handed use, such as light demolition work, driving in masonry nails, and to cut stone or metal with a chisel. The head is forged from tempered carbon-steel for strength and the graphite-core shaft, along with ergonomic handle, helps to reduce strain on your muscles and joints because it absorbs shocks.

results.name: One-Piece Hammer, 1.25 lb.
results.description: This DEWALT DWHT51054 1.25 lb. 1-piece hammer is designed to be reliable and extremely durable. The weight of this hammer is evenly distributed, providing a strong and comfortable swing.

results.name: 17OZ HICKORY HAMMER
results.description: The DEWALT 17 oz. High Velocity Hammer can be used to hammer and remove nails. It features an axe handle design for a comfortable grip. This hammer has a hickory handle for durability.

results.name: 14oz High Velocity Hammer
results.description: The DEWALT 14oz MIG Weld Framing Hammer is the lightest all steel framing hammer ever made.  At just 14oz it strikes with the force of a 28oz hammer.  The lightweight design and vibration absorbing grip minimize fatigue, and the magnetic nail starter enables easy one-handed nail placement.

results.name: Sledge Hammer 4 lbs
results.description: Clear away pieces of wood, drive in iron spikes, rock chisels, drills, large nails and other materials made of wood, cement, metal and iron with the help of the Garant sledge hammer. This striking tool with a black finish, has a 4 lb forged and tempered steel head for increased strength and rigidity. Its 16 inch (40.64 cm) varnished hickory handle absorbs shock well. This sledge hammer is designed for DIYers and professionals looking for an efficient tool with an excellent quality/price ratio.

results.name: 20 Oz. Rip Claw Hammer W/shock Reduction Grip
results.description: The 20 Oz. Rip Hammer has a bonded and moulded Shock Reduction Grip<sup></sup> that reduces shock up to 70% and will not come off. Estwing hammers are the only hammers that can make this claim. The head and handle are forged in one piece and are fully polished. This tool has unsurpassed balance and temper. Made in the USA.

results.name: 1.25 lb. Steel Ripping Hammer
results.description: The Husky 20 oz. Ripping Hammer features a forward weight design to create more force with each swing, reducing the amount of blows needed to accomplish each task. The hammer has a curved grip for nonslip usage while a thumb indent maximizes striking accuracy. The balance and smooth swing action associated with this hammer result in less user fatigue and increased productivity on the job site.

results.name: Tibone Tbii-15 Milled Face/Curved 18 Inch Titanium Handle
results.description: The Stiletto 15oz all Titanium TIBONE(tm)  Framer with a Milled replaceable Steel face and a Curved axe-style grip is incredibly strong, powerful and lightweight - with 10 times less shock than Steel! Features such as improved balance, better face hardness and durability, stronger head-to-handle connection and its signature magnetic nail slot puts this hammer in a class of its own.  The Titanium Framer Hammer is ideal for the professional framer, remodeler, and finish carpenters.

results.name: 16 oz. Fiberglass Claw Hammer
results.description: 16 oz. Claw Fiberglass Hammer: Basic tool at excellent price. It's a good and convenient design hammer for DIY striking and pulling nails.

results.name: 14oz Titanium Milled Face/Curved 18-inch Framer
results.description: The Stiletto 14oz Titanium Milled Face/Curved 18 Framer Hammer is the most popular framing weight in our line of solid Titanium head hammers. Hits like a 24 Oz Steel hammer with 45% less weight and 10 times less recoil shock! Features such as improved balance, better face hardness and durability, stronger head-to-handle connection and its signature magnetic nail slot puts this hammer in a class of its own. The 14oz Titanium Milled Face/Curved 18 Framer Hammer is ideal for the professional framer, remodeler, and finish carpenters.

results.name: 17 oz. Milled Face Framing Hammer
results.description: The Milwaukee 17oz Milled Face Hammer is designed from the ground-up to address common user frustrations with hammers currently available on the market, providing superior driving performance with up to 10X less peak vibration. Constructed with a steel I-Beam Handle, the new hammer is designed to withstand the harshest jobsite use and a SHOCKSHIELD grip provides best-in-class grip durability and vibration reduction. For added user benefit, the hammer features an anti-ring claw design which reduces noise and ringing when striking hardened objects.

results.name: 16 Oz. Claw hammer w/vinyl grip
results.description: 16 oz Solid Steel Curve claw hammer with blue nylon vinyl shock reduction grip

results.name: 19 oz. Smooth Face Poly / Fiberglass Handle Hammer
results.description: The Milwaukee 19 oz. Poly Fiberglass Hammer is designed to have the most durable fiberglass handle in the industry. Its precision balanced design provides strong and smooth striking power while the rubber oversold provides a non-slip grip. An integrated magnetic nail set is designed to allow users to set nails one handed and the asymmetrical anti-ring claw minimizes ringing when striking hard objects.

results.name: 24Oz Hammer Tooth Framing Hammer
results.description: 24 oz Solid Steel Hammertooth hammer with milled face and blue nylon shock reduction grip

results.name: 8 oz. Mini Hammer
results.description: The 8 oz. mini hammer from HDX is light and useful, essential for every home's indoor work. The easy-hold grip make it perfect for indoor DIY projects.

results.name: 22 oz. Demo Hammer
results.description: The DEWALT<sup></sup> Demo Hammer is a multi-functional tool designed to overcome even the toughest demolition job. With an oversized strike face for breaking through drywall and an elongated claw curve for easy prying of nails, standard hammer features have been optimized for demolition applications. A unique 2x4 gripper has been added, making prying floor boards and framing easy. The DEWALT<sup></sup> Demo Hammer is the all-in-one tool designed for the particular needs of remodelling and residential/commercial demolition.

results.name: 16 oz. Ripping Hammer
results.description: This Husky 16 oz. Ripping Hammer features a forward weight design to amplify the force of each swing, allowing for a much faster, and safer swing. Each hammer has a nonslip curved handle that maximizes striking accuracy and reduces user fatigue.

results.name: 22 oz. Milled Face Framing Hammer
results.description: The Milwaukee 22 oz. Hammer is designed for the Best Driving Performance. It's precision balanced design provides strong and smooth striking power, while the I-beam handle construction is designed to provide a lifetime of service without bending. The Shockshield Grip, reduces Vibration up to 10X more that the competition and is the most durable grip in the industry. An integrated magnetic nail set is designed to allow users to set nails one handed and the asymmetrical anti-ring claw minimizes ringing when striking hard objects.

results.name: EST 16 Oz Claw NYL Grip
results.description: Made in U.S.A.

results.name: 22 oz. Framing Hammer
results.description: 22 oz Solid steel framing hammer with blue nylon vinyl shock reduction grip.

results.name: 19 Oz Blue Vinyl Gripped Ultra Framing Hammer With Milled Face
results.description: The new Ultra Series hammers from Estwing. These hammers are light, to drive nails faster and forged in 1-piece out of fine tool steel for long life and dependability. Ultra Hammers are designed with the professional in mind. Ultra Hammers are stronger than the competitors because they are forged in 1-piece of steel, no welding, and no joints that can fail. These tools have the world famous and patented Estwing Shock Reduction Grip. The grip which reduces vibration up to 70% is bonded on and will not come off. Estwing hammers are the only hammers that can make this claim. An extra nail pulling notch is built into the head of our hammers for use in tight spots. These hammers also have a magnetic nail starter in the head. This tool has unsurpassed balance and temper. This 19 oz. framing hammer has a milled face, and longer length handle. Made in USA. Protect your eyes from flying particles and dust. Always wear safety goggles. Bystanders shall also wear safety goggles.

results.name: 12oz Double Faced Mallet
results.description: This Sure Strike 12 oz. Double-Face Soft Hammer from Estwing is well suited for assembling furniture, setting dowels and handling wood projects that require non-marring blows. The hammer features two distinct types of heads, one soft and one hard to accommodate versatile jobs. Built to last, it is designed with a genuine, top grade, 10-1/2 in. curved hickory handle with triple wedge construction, creating a solid, dependable structure. Users and bystanders should always wear safety goggles to protect eyes from flying particles and dust

results.name: 17 Oz Steel Framing Hammer
results.description: 17oz one-piece steel efficiency hammer strikes like a 21oz. Lighter weight design, but strikes more harder. Forward Efficient striking design.

results.name: 20oz Pro Claw Hammer
results.description: The Toolmaster Pro Claw Hammer is made to get the job done.  Features anti-shock design with comfort TPR handle, superior steel construction and handy magnetic nail set. This 20 oz hammer provides heavy striking with minimal effort.

results.name: 27 oz. Dead Blow Rubber Handle Hammer
results.description: The 27 oz. Dead Blow Hammer is very good at minimizing damage to the struck surface and in controlling striking force with minimal rebound from the striking surface. Very good strength and quality.

results.name: 10 oz. Ash Handle Ripping Hammer
results.description: This 10 oz. Ripping Hammer provides excellent strength while still remaining lightweight. The ash wooden handle is designed to fit your hand comfortably.

results.name: 5 oz. Tack Hammer
results.description: Best used for driving tacks and brads. 5 oz tack hammer is essential in every home.  Light and useful, also at a very good price. Meets ASME.

results.name: 32oz Fiberglass Handle Ball Peen Hammer
results.description: This 32oz Ball Peen is ideal for striking, punching, riveting, shaping and straightening metal. Fiberglass handle for better strength and comfortable grip for holding.

results.name: 20 oz. Fiberglass Ripping Hammer
results.description: A very good DIY tool, light and comfortable handles with a 20 oz. hammer head. Good design ripping claw for strength striking and ripping materials. With the best quality we promise, we exceed ASME Specs at a good price, too.

results.name: 32-Ounce Dead Blow Hammer
results.description: This 32-ounce dead blow hammer is essential for any job where you need a solid hammer strike, minus the damage that a standard metal hammer can do to a surface. The textured criss-cross pattern on the handle ensures the hammer won't slip in your hand, while the internal construction of the head provides maximum impact with minimum rebound  excellent for hammering in cramped spaces.

results.name: 4Lb Blacksmith Hammer Fibreglass Handle
results.description: 64 oz Sure Strike Blacksmith hammer with fibreglass handle

results.name: 28 oz. Shingler's Hammer
results.description: Shingler's Hammer with Replaceable Blade and Gauge. Milled Face.

results.name: 16-Ounce Claw Hammer with Graphite Core and Composite Handle
results.description: With its heat-treated forged head, this 16-ounce graphite-core curved claw hammer was built for exceptional strength, greater durability and high impact resistance. The claw hammer features a non-slip ergonomic handle that is flared for better comfort and control. The magnetic nail holder helps to secure your nails in place for improved convenience, precision and safety.

results.name: 14 Oz Drywall Hammer with Shock Reduction Grip and Scored and Crowned Face
results.description: 14 oz drywall hammer has a bonded and moulded on Shock Reduction Grip<sup></sup> that reduces shock up to 70% and will not come off. Estwing hammers are the only hammers that can make this claim. The head and handle are forged in one piece and fully polished. The face is Crowned and Scored for working with drywall. The hammer has a 1 14 In. blade. Made in the USA

results.name: Ball pein hammer, machinist, 4oz 10 inch
results.description: Machinist ball pein hammer,  4oz, 10 inch varnished hickory handle. Drive chisels, punches and drills and large nails and fold/sculpt pieces of flexible metal with the help of the Garant machinist ball-pein hammer. This striking tool has a 4 oz painted and polished head and a 10 inch (25.4 cm) varnished hickory handle. This machinist hammer is designed for DIYers and professionals looking for a efficient tool with an excellent quality/price ratio.

results.name: 20-Ounce Claw Hammer with Wavex Shock-Absorbing Shaft
results.description: This slightly heftier version of the 16-ounce claw hammer with Wavex shaft delivers a slightly heavier blow, but still has all the same features you expect as a professional: a heat-treated hammer face for hardness; a substantial composite handle with cushioning for security and comfort; and a shock-absorbing shaft that helps minimize wear and tear on your hand, wrist, arm and shoulder.
